metadata.title: CVE-2018-14634 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
An integer overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernel'screate_elf_tables() function. An unprivileged local user with access toSUID (or otherwise privileged) binary could use this flaw to escalate theirprivileges on the system. Kernel versions 2.6.x, 3.10.x and 4.14.x arebelieved to be vulnerable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14634` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
